properties.content: Condition: Excellent (Minor scratches on the bottom casing)
"Lightly used 2015 MacBook Pro 13-inch. In excellent condition, with only minor scratches on the bottom casing. Battery health is at 85%. Includes original charger."
Shipping Information: Free shipping within the US.

issues: - Property "horizontalSizing" is not a valid property for layoutContainers. Should be layoutSizingHorizontal/layoutSizingVertical.
- Missing visibilityOverrides for some text layers in "10:5620" (appbar) component.
- "10:7816" component is missing required properties in the design system schema.
- Text style "Headline/Large" is not found in DESIGN_SYSTEM_DATA. Using "Headline".
- Text style "Title/Large" is not found in DESIGN_SYSTEM_DATA. Using "Title".
- Text style "Body/Medium" is not found in DESIGN_SYSTEM_DATA. Using "Body".
- Text style "Title/Medium" is not found in DESIGN_SYSTEM_DATA. Using "Title".
- Text style "Body/Large" is not found in DESIGN_SYSTEM_DATA. Using "Body".
- Text style "Caption/Small" is not found in DESIGN_SYSTEM_DATA. Using "Caption".
- "10:7805" component is missing required properties in the design system schema.
- "10:10214" component is missing required properties in the design system schema.
- "10:3907" component is missing required properties in the design system schema.
- "635:4744" component is missing required properties in the design system schema.
- "635:4533" component is missing required properties in the design system schema.
changes: - Added visibilityOverrides for text layers in "10:5620".
- Corrected text style names in native-text elements.
